sentences.engSentences: Fax Your resume and cover letter to the above number
sentences.twSentences: 請把你的履歷表和求職信傳真到上面的號碼

sentences.engSentences: There are several job openings at the restaurant right now
sentences.twSentences: 那間餐廳目前有幾個職缺

sentences.engSentences: JX Finances officially announced the opening of its first international branch
sentences.twSentences: JX Finances 公司正式宣布第一間海外分公司開始營業

sentences.engSentences: Applicants are required to submit a resume
sentences.twSentences: 應徵者必須提交一份履歷表

sentences.engSentences: A driver is license is a requirement of this job.
sentences.twSentences: 駕照是這份工作的必要條件

sentences.engSentences: Applicants must meet all the requirements for the job.
sentences.twSentences: 應徵者必須符合這份工作的所有必要條件

sentences.engSentences: People with master's degrees are qualified for the research position.
sentences.twSentences: 有碩士學位的人，有資格得到研究工作的職位
